Protocols/UICountDownDelegate.html#/s:11.name: countDownFinished()
Protocols/UICountDownDelegate.html#/s:11.abstract: Gets called when the countdown reaches zero.

Protocols/UICountDownDelegate.html#/s:11.name: secondsRemaining(seconds:)
Protocols/UICountDownDelegate.html#/s:11.abstract: Returns the seconds remaining for the countdown to end.

Protocols/UICountDownDelegate.html.name: UICountDownDelegate
Protocols/UICountDownDelegate.html.abstract: The protocol responsible for the UICountDown’s delegate.

Enums/UICountDownType.html#/s:11AZCountD.name: singleDigit
Enums/UICountDownType.html#/s:11AZCountD.abstract: Shows the UICountDown in a single digit format in which both numbers of the value animate at the same time.

Enums/UICountDownType.html#/s:11AZCountD.name: doubleDigit
Enums/UICountDownType.html#/s:11AZCountD.abstract: Shows the UICountDown in a double digit format in which each number of the value animates separately.

Classes/UICountDown.html#/s:11AZCountDow.name: type
Classes/UICountDown.html#/s:11AZCountDow.abstract: Decides what type of countdown to show.

Classes/UICountDown.html#/s:11AZCountDow.name: setColonSeparators
Classes/UICountDown.html#/s:11AZCountDow.abstract: Sets colons to separate seconds from minutes from hours from days.

Classes/UICountDown.html#/s:11AZCountDow.name: colonColor
Classes/UICountDown.html#/s:11AZCountDow.abstract: Sets the color of the separator colons.

Classes/UICountDown.html#/s:11AZCountDow.name: hideTitles
Classes/UICountDown.html#/s:11AZCountDow.abstract: Decides wether to hide the titles below the countdown.

Classes/UICountDown.html#/s:11AZCountDow.name: timeInterval
Classes/UICountDown.html#/s:11AZCountDow.abstract: Sets the time interval which the count down must obey. Must be set before countdown.

Classes/UICountDown.html#/s:11AZCountDow.name: convertToPersian
Classes/UICountDown.html#/s:11AZCountDow.abstract: Converts the countdown numbers shown to Persian.

Classes/UICountDown.html#/s:11AZCountDow.name: setBorder(width:color:cornerRadius:)
Classes/UICountDown.html#/s:11AZCountDow.abstract: Configures the layer of the countdown cells.

Classes/UICountDown.html#/s:11AZCountDow.name: customize(type:backgroundColor:numberColor:font:borderWidth:borderColor:cornerRadius:titleColor:titleFont:colonColor:)
Classes/UICountDown.html#/s:11AZCountDow.abstract: Customize the appearance of the countdown view.

Classes/UICountDown.html#/s:11AZCountDow.name: textColor
Classes/UICountDown.html#/s:11AZCountDow.abstract: Sets the color of the text fields below the timer.

Classes/UICountDown.html#/s:11AZCountDow.name: titleFont
Classes/UICountDown.html#/s:11AZCountDow.abstract: Sets the font to use for the bottom titles.

Classes/UICountDown.html#/s:11AZCountDow.name: titles
Classes/UICountDown.html#/s:11AZCountDow.abstract: An array of 4 strings which sets the titles below the timer.

Classes/UICountDown.html#/c:@M@AZCountDo.name: init(coder:)
Classes/UICountDown.html#/c:@M@AZCountDo.abstract: Returns an object initialized from data in a given unarchiver.

Classes/UICountDown.html#/s:11AZCountDow.name: init(fromTime:interval:type:)
Classes/UICountDown.html#/s:11AZCountDow.abstract: Initializes a UICountdown object and sets up its properties.

Classes/UICountDown.html#/s:11AZCountDow.name: secondsRemaining(seconds:)
Classes/UICountDown.html#/s:11AZCountDow.abstract: Returns the time remaining in the countdown in seconds.

Classes/UICountDown.html#/s:11AZCountDow.name: countDownFinished()
Classes/UICountDown.html#/s:11AZCountDow.abstract: Gets called when the timer reaches zero.

Classes/UICountDown.html.name: UICountDown
Classes/UICountDown.html.abstract: A customizable view that sets a timer and starts counting down towards zero from the given value.
